Definition: Pilot readiness: safe to start clinical pilot on-site
Minimum evidence (examples): DR-2 Go/No-Go signed; claims/acceptance locked; site SOPs; pilot execution runbook; daily QA SOP/tools; data privacy controls; model/app baseline freeze; evidence manifest created

Definition: Algorithm performance readiness: meets acceptance criteria on golden dataset (clinic)
Minimum evidence (examples): Golden dataset v1 freeze; BA analysis; MAE/MAPE; valid-rate >= target; QS calibrated; V&V report updated; automated TFL + drift dashboard + G1 evidence bundle

Definition: Submission readiness: EU MDR + US FDA evidence packs complete (as applicable)
Minimum evidence (examples): GSPR applicability filled; Annex II/III index complete; RMF complete; PMS/PMCF plan; cybersecurity file; HFE summative report; V&V final
